title: U.S. Senator Tuberville Asks DOJ, SEC to Investigate Crypto Broker Prometheum
description: U.S. Senator Thomas Tuberville (R-Ala.) wrote an open letter to Attorney General Merrick Garland and Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Gary Gensler asking them to investigate Prometheum, a special-purpose broker that recently secured federal permissions to offer crypto trading services.

title: An Orb, a Token and Money for Everyone: Worldcoin’s CEO on Crypto’s Most Daring Project
description: Alex Blania on collaborating with Sam Altman on a universal basic income for eight billion people.

title: Bitcoin’s ‘Halving’: Profit Surge or Miner Meltdown?
description: In a recent report by David Pan for Bloomberg News, the upcoming “Halving” event for Bitcoin, a significant occurrence that happens every four years, is causing concern among some Bitcoin miners. The event, which reduces the amount of Bitcoin miners can earn for validating transactions by half, has historically led to substantial increases in Bitcoin’s […]

title: PEPE and top meme coins face bearish pressure as new competitors enter the scene
description: The largest meme coins in the cryptocurrency market, including Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and PepeCoin (PEPE), have faced a downturn in recent days as new competitors emerge in the sector. The negative market sentiment, driven by bearish moves in Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), has further compounded the challenges faced by these meme coins, ... Read more
